/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, teeming with life and activity. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is a hive of movement, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban maze. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky above. The sky itself is a vibrant blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a sunny and warm day. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
